My Services

Horse Racing Expert

Pricing: $80 per 1000 words

(the prices are negotiable to a reasonable extent)

Analyses

I can do either horse by horse or an overall analysis of the race. One properly done race usually takes up 500 words. I used to write commentaries for HRT, currently for Czech websites.

Reviews

A look at the result in a way you desire. I can focus on whatever you want me to, either just the winner, the first three finishers, or even the history of the race.

Stories

I have written stories on kidnapped horses (3 parts), about the Japanese and European Road to the Kentucky Derby, and about what makes a big meeting a traditional one.

Narrative Designer

Pricing: Negotiable

(depends on the scale of your project)

Worldbuilding with Original Language

I studied English Philology while focusing on the history of languages; therefore, my skills in developing a new one beautifully fit my worldbuilding passion.

Characters and Dialogues

I published a book in 2022 that was praised for the characters, character development, and dialogues. I usually focus on LGBTQ+ stories with hints of humor.

Escape Room

In 2023, a couple of guys approached me with their outdoor game, resembling an escape room one. I created a custom story for the game, loosely based on a legend emanating from a local village.

Other Services

Pricing: $40 per 650 words

(the prizing for Web Development depends on the scale)

Copywriting

I've been working for a Spanish company, VIME, writing articles for their clients. My most comfortable topics are video games (I was even writing about games for KeenGamer), movies, books, technology, and leisure time.

Web Development

I've learned everything on my own. I'll be grateful if you allow me to hone my skills on your projects because I love coding, am eager to learn more stuff, and am responsible and loyal.
